title: Show us photos of hot v cold
text:
Email 4 August 2015 
For August’s photography competition, we want to see images that best represent the theme of hot and cold. This could be a photo of an icy tundra, a scorching desert or something that shows the extremes of both. As always, feel free to interpret the theme as broadly as you like and don’t forget to tell us where you took the shot! 
Judges 
Your work will be reviewed by former Time photo editor Erica Campbell, New York Times contributing photographer Jared Kohler and BBC Travel contributing editor Richard Conway. The winner will join the ranks as a BBC Travel Photo nomad and the winning shot will be featured on BBC.com. 
Deadline 
Submissions will close Monday 17 August, and finalists will be announced the week of 24 August. Our judges will name a winner at the end of the month. 
Next month, we'll be looking for photographs that epitomize the view from the open road. See last month’s finalists and the winner for the theme of unbreakable .
